globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com https://aistudiocdn.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com;
